|vendor_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |device_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |subvendor_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |subdevice_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |id_string = <!-- PnP ID string --> |windosid = <!-- Windows ID, Leave blank for none --> |fcc_id = IMRWLPCE2411R |icid = <!-- Industry Canada ID, Leave blank for none --> |boardid = <!-- Board ID --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id --> |oui = 00:02:2D
|chip1 = Lucent;HERMES I; |chip2 = Agere;; |chip3 = Agere;W4050; |chip4 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; -->
|antconn = MC |wirelessstand = IEEE 802.11b |802.11b = 11 |wififreq = 2.4 |receive_sens = <!-- Receive sensitivity --> |transmit_power = <!-- Transmit power -->

|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 11/28/2001 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |country = Taiwan

}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== [http://www.netstumbler.org/newbie-lounge/fujitsu-siemens-e-1100-pc-card-t11488.html On the NetStumbler.org forums] :The card pictured is an [[ORiNOCO PC Card (Ruby)]], but it is possible some early models are standard ORiNOCO cards. The box for the device clearly pictures a non-Ruby card.
